label: Interviewee: Relating Firsthand Experience, Consideration, Body Language (raised eyebrow), Gesturing

body.value: But I gotta say that my experience has been: Spanish language media has done a great job of catching up and getting rid of those â€“ I mean, we're not good friends, but I met him a long time ago, Jorge Ramos. He's become a great spokesman as it should be. That's what we need. More. And he's been a great spokesman for the diversity issues. I mean, you saw what he did. He challenged Trump. So yeah, they've I think they've stepped up very well.
